meanings.definition: A sudden feeling of shock or surprise.
meanings.sent1: The loud bang caused a startlement in the quiet room.
meanings.sent2: Her sudden appearance caused startlement among the guests.
meanings.sent3: The startlement on his face was priceless when he saw the birthday surprise.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected news hit her with a wave of startlement.
meanings.sent5: The startlement in her eyes was evident as she opened the mysterious package.

meanings.definition: The act of startling or surprising someone.
meanings.sent1: His startlement of the audience was intentional to create suspense.
meanings.sent2: The magician's startlement of the crowd left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent3: The startlement in the haunted house was all part of the spooky experience.
meanings.sent4: The startlement in the movie kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent5: The sudden startlement in the play made the audience gasp in surprise.
